name: You Know The Drill (A2LAN, jtn00b)
description:
Diggory Digby is an energetic wannabe spelunker whose dream is to uncover the many things that lie underground, with the moral support (or lack there of) of his friend Molly, a cynical girl who happen to be accidentally good at puns.

Help him dig through the ground with his pogo-drill by avoiding the hazards in his way.

This submission only contains one playable level.

Level guide:

- Blank tile, you can dig it safely.

 - This one takes longer to dig through. Maybe it can lead to an useful powerup...or not.

- This tile has a trap underneath. You already know what do to.

- The trap that you must avoid at all costs.

- This item gives you an energy boost. Your energy drains over time, so you might want to look for those.

Controls (also supports controller):

- Arrow keys/D-pad - Move

- Space/Button A - Dig/select

Credits to DarkVampireDee for additional sprites
